versiondescription: Fighter-bomber and nuclear strike version, similar to the F-86F-25.
loadnotes: Either stations 1 to 4 or stations 5 to 12 can be used.
Stations 5 to 12 can each carry two RKs.
As an exception to the normal loading rules, a Mk 12 nuclear bomb (weight 1200 and load 3.0) can be carried on either station 2 or 3.
